content.json:
## Overview

This workbook provides 
- Default Overview of DataSource Statistics from Usage Table and Detection coverage in existing Microsoft Sentinel Workspace from SecurityAlerts Table.
	- This can be changed to rules coverage by following Microsoft Sentinel API Notebook section, ingest rules data and point to new CustomLogs table 
	- Refer Notebook section : [![nbviewer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jupyter/design/master/logos/Badges/nbviewer_badge.svg)](https://nbviewer.org/github/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Tools/MITREATT%26CK-LayerGeneration-Notebook/MITRE%20ATT%26CK%20for%20Microsoft%20Sentinel.ipynb#Retrieve-via-Microsoft-Sentinel-API)
- Global Detection Statistics available from Microsoft Sentinel Community Github
- Other Microsoft Detection Platform Services (e.g. Azure Defender, AIP, MSDE, MCAS etc)

## Links and Resources

- Microsoft Sentinel Github : https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/
- Microsoft Sentinel Fusion : https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/fusion
- Azure Defender: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/security-center/alerts-reference
- Azure Identity Protection (AIP): https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/identity-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks
- Microsoft Defender for Identity: https://docs.microsoft.com/advanced-threat-analytics/suspicious-activity-guide
- Microsoft Cloud Application Security (MCAS) : https://docs.microsoft.com/cloud-app-security/investigate-anomaly-alerts
# ** Data Sources Available in Current Microsoft Sentinel **

content.query:
Usage 
| summarize SizeinMB = round(sum(Quantity),2) by DataType 
| sort by SizeinMB desc

content.json: # Detections Coverage in Existing Microsoft Sentinel

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where isnotempty(ProviderName)
| summarize Count=dcount(AlertName) by ProviderName, VendorName

SecurityAlert
| where isnotempty(ProviderName)
| summarize Count=count() by ProviderName, VendorName, AlertName
| sort by ProviderName

content.json:
## MITRE ATT&CK Coverage against Microsoft Sentinel Github

# Links and Resources :
- Tactics : https://attack.mitre.org/tactics/enterprise/
- Enterprise Matrix : https://attack.mitre.org/matrices/enterprise/

content.title: Query Type Breakdown

content.query:
let SentinelGithub = (externaldata(MITREMatrix: string, Tactic: string, TechniqueId:string, TechniqueName:string, Platform: string , DetectionType: string , DetectionService: string , DetectionId: string, DetectionName: string, DetectionDescription: string, ConnectorId: string, DataTypes: string, Query: string , QueryFrequency: string , QueryPeriod:string , TriggerOperator: string, TriggerThreshold: string, DetectionSeverity: string, DetctionUrl: string, IngestedDate: string )
[@"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/master/Tools/MITREATT%26CK-LayerGeneration-Notebook/MicrosoftSentinel.csv"]
);
SentinelGithub
| where isnotempty(Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic=="Privilege Escalation","PrivilegeEscalation",Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic=="Persistance","Persistence",Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic=="CommmandAndControl","CommandAndControl",Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic=="Defense Evasion","DefenseEvasion",Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic in ("IntialAccess","InitalAccess"),"InitialAccess",Tactic)
| summarize Count=dcount(DetectionId) by Tactic
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Tactic Level Breakdown

content.query:
let SentinelGithub = (externaldata(MITREMatrix: string, Tactic: string, TechniqueId:string, TechniqueName:string, Platform: string , DetectionType: string , DetectionService: string , DetectionId: string, DetectionName: string, DetectionDescription: string, ConnectorId: string, DataTypes: string, Query: string , QueryFrequency: string , QueryPeriod:string , TriggerOperator: string, TriggerThreshold: string, DetectionSeverity: string, DetctionUrl: string, IngestedDate: string )
[@"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/master/Tools/MITREATT%26CK-LayerGeneration-Notebook/MicrosoftSentinel.csv"]
);
SentinelGithub
| where isnotempty(Platform)
| summarize Count=dcount(DetectionId) by Platform
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Platform Level Breakdown

content.query:
let SentinelGithub = (externaldata(MITREMatrix: string, Tactic: string, TechniqueId:string, TechniqueName:string, Platform: string , DetectionType: string , DetectionService: string , DetectionId: string, DetectionName: string, DetectionDescription: string, ConnectorId: string, DataTypes: string, Query: string , QueryFrequency: string , QueryPeriod:string , TriggerOperator: string, TriggerThreshold: string, DetectionSeverity: string, DetctionUrl: string, IngestedDate: string )
[@"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/master/Tools/MITREATT%26CK-LayerGeneration-Notebook/MicrosoftSentinel.csv"]
);
SentinelGithub
| where isnotempty(Tactic) and isnotempty(Platform)
| distinct Platform, DataTypes, DetectionType, DetectionName,DetctionUrl 
| sort by Platform asc, DetectionType asc
content.title: DataSource Level Breakdown
Detections by Microsoft Services
ASC - Resource Type Breakdown
List of Alerts by Microsoft Services
